column4: WHat are the advantages of using ubuntu? i mean, what can it do that windows cant?
if you are looking to ubuntu as a windows replacement, it's quite likely you will be disappointed, because it is not
It nonetheless tries to provide everything a user might need (that windows already provides)
for websites, Linux makes a great server, all the tools you need to maintain a website are readily installable -- as for games, the linux games industry has a lot of way to go yet
